short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Adobe presets generated from photos by your favorite photographers, straight from Chrome. For Adobe Lightroom + Camera Raw.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A shortcut to learning to edit like your favorite photographers. Use PresetNinja to generate and export Adobe Lightroom presets based on the edits of your favorite photos. PresetNinja uses existing data baked into the image's metadata to generate a preset that you can immediately download straight from your browser and import into Lightroom and test on your own photos. 

Hours of trial and error no longer necessary -- just download the presets you wanna try on your photos and immediately reverse engineer your favorite styles to learn exactly how they did it.

Compatible with Adobe Lightroom, Lightroom Classic, and Adobe Camera Raw.
